name: Alien Invasion (itch) (TheBoyz)
description:
Play as Donald Trump in this top-down shooter. Enact Trump's "foreign policy" as he tries to keep the alien threat at bay. 

This game is a group effort created as a class project. 

CMPM/ARTG 120

Spring 2017

Team Members: 

  • Austin Kellar
  • Alfredo Cuevas
  • Dustin Halsey
  • Salvador Galindo
  • Joshua Clouse
**Note: Alien Invasion seems to act weird sometimes on itch. If there is a problem with the cursor reload the page. **
